text: @afneil Well good luck with that!  We know for sure a Chinese doctor was shut up when he tried to alert the World of this NEW strain of Coronavirus. Presumably he had treated symptoms, & had lab test results before doing so. A Wuhan laboratory must have known early on of Covid-19!
